HPI 8608 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1991 All-Japan Touring Car Championship Race (JTC Round 3) Winner M. Hasemi/A. Olofsson



Masahiro Hasemi and Anders Olofsson started the 1991 JTC season in the #50 Reebok car for rounds 1 and 2, and switched to the #3 Reebok car seen here in round 3. Iâ€™m not sure why but the reason is probably buried on some Japanese site somewhere. They won this event and went on to win the 1991 championship.
